description.p: This mantle was made of leather, made from the skin of a once slayed foul beast. Stitched together by an apprentice, who has once been, the wearer can use it to shield himself or herself from some minor harm.

p.b: Effect: When donned as an Bonus Action it grants the user +1 AC

description.p: A golden amulet with an engraved skull. The skull is surroundet by three grooves, where one groove carries a perfect, deep green, emerald.

p.b: When first attached your constitution attribute is raised to 18. Once per long rest when you die you are revived in a burst of green light with 1 hp.

sheet.description: Revives you once you are downed with 1 HP.
